name: I Am Her Eau de Parfum Travel Spray
about: Fragrance Family: Warm & Spicy..Scent Type: Warm & Sweet Gourmands..Key Notes: Red Velvet, Pear, Oud..Fragrance Description: Get ready for an obsession like no other with this rich, faceted gourmand that layers decadent notes of red velvet, pear, and raspberry for an addictive scent that will leave everyone wanting more...About the Fragrance: She is the It Girl in every room she enters: aspirational, effortless, and always approachable. She is you. After years of development with the best perfumers in the industry, the FORVR Mood Fine Fragrances are finally here. Discover four completely unique, unforgettable fragrances, from sweet and approachable, to in charge and unapologetic. For everyone, every day, every mood...About the Bottle: Self-care isnu2019t selfish. Itu2019s a love letter to yourself that you write every day, sealed with a spray of your perfume. Like a precious diamond, these four fine fragrances reflect every one of your facets, from flirty and feminine to bold and unapologetic. These fragrances are encased in a stunning bottle reminiscent of Jackieu2019s engagement ring, and inspired by the brilliance of diamonds and the allure of precious gems.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance (Parfum), Water (Aqua/Eau), Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Ethylhexyl Salicylate Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: FORVR Mood's I Am Her Eau de Parfum is a sophisticated scent that seamlessly captures elegance with a bold twist. With an inviting blend of floral and warm notes, it offers a refined sweetness that doesnu2019t overpower, making it perfect for both day and evening wear.  The fragrance opens with a burst of freshness, transitioning into a smooth, comforting warmth that lingers on the skin. It balances rich, creamy notes with a touch of spice, giving it a unique depth that feels both luxurious and personal. The longevity is impressive, lasting throughout the day without needing touch-ups, which adds great value. Plus, the scent evolves beautifully, leaving a lasting impression thatu2019s both subtle and memorable.  The bottle design is also stunningu2014simple yet chic, reflecting the quality and thoughtful details that FORVR Mood is known for. Overall, I Am Her is perfect for anyone who loves a fragrance thatu2019s classy, memorable, and empowering. If you want a signature scent that exudes confidence and style, this perfume is a fantastic choice!

This is one of my favorite fragrances to wear on its own or pairs perfectly with other gourmands. Iu2019ve received so many compliments every single time I wear this. This is a fragrance that isnu2019t too much for everyday, but is definitely a head turner. It really makes you feel like you are u201cthat girlu201d and the name I am her fits perfectly. 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yall. She really is that girl. Iu2019ll admit I was not blown away by this scent at first but after a few days of testing, Iu2019m in love! This is lightly sweet, a little spicy, but still elegant. The oud deepens this just perfectly and is still wearable for everyday. Iu2019m a gourmand girly and if this was not sweet enough for you, I suggest layering it with a vanilla body cream or vanilla perfume oil. I layered with Vanilla Musk by Nemat and truly cannot stop sniffing myself. Hard to Get is also GORGEOUS if you like vanilla. This is my plug to Sephora, anyone else whou2019s reading: we need more black women in the fragrance world. Jackie did her thing with these scents and we need more!

reviews.review_title: Will have your man in Burberry top in 9 months...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not gonna lie, I was scared this scent was going to be too sweet to the point that it'd be nauseating (as most sweeter fragrances are to me). However, once I sprayed I Am Her on my wrist and took a sniff, I IMMEDIATELY transcended into heaven. My goodness, one thing Ms. Aina knows how to do very well (aside from slaying and snatching our edges every week) is curate an experience within a fragrance!!! The sweetness of I Am Her isn't overbearing - it's actually very intoxicating thanks to the oud note within the formula. I personally don't get much of the red velvet, but the raspberry (and pear) note also makes this scent smell so juicy and nice! This is definitely a scent for the women who love to take up space and do so without hesitation! And if you have a man?? Chile just start working on your baby registry and shower the moment you wear this around them. 10s across the board!!!!!!!!! ud83dudc85ud83cudffe

Iu2019d give it. a 3/5 in my opinion. itu2019s not bad but not what i go for.

It isn't full on cupcake, but it does dry down a bit sweeter than full fruity, and similar to a little amber or musk. I only use 1 spray myself, since it starts big, I feel like more sprays the whole room will smell you and it might start to give body spray vibes. Lasts a few hours well, but you might want to add again before date night if you had it on all day for work.  Small note about the mini size, the 10ml size is a short, chubby bottle and not a long slender size like a lot of other brands use. It is a spray but looks like it could be a roll on size Gifted by Forvr Mood for review

reviews.review_title: The Approachable It Girlu2019s Signature Scent!

It also has an amazing wear time( I wore it at night when i first received it and woke up the next morning still smelling like it!). A head turner and heavy complimented fragrance as well. I am a gourmand girl through and through! I would say u2018I am heru2019 delivers on those sweet notes but you get that spice note from the oud. In my opinion, the oud helps balance this gourmand so itu2019s not sickeningly sweet. Without the oud, this would be too sweet for my taste. I am curious to smell the other fragrances in this collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin

I will say that this l, on my skin, only lasts a few hours, maybe four tops and that is even consistent on my clothing because I do tend to spray on my skin and then spray some on my shirt. So while I do think this is a pretty scent on not sure if I would purchase a full size. I do think they may be a great layering scent though with other fruity scents.

reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for I Am Her, but unfortunately it missed the mark for me. It lacks the depth and uniqueness that I typically seek from a fragrance. The sweet red velvet note makes for a delicious opening, but unfortunately it fades way too quickly. Within seconds, and as the perfume continues to dry down, you are left with a strong raspberry note and maybe a small hint of pear. Although this ends with a nice fruity scent, there just arenu2019t enough layers left to this perfume. Had the yummy red velvet note stayed longer, I may have felt different. The bottle is gorgeous, but the font and lettering on the front cheapen the look. Overall, the scent and the bottle are reminiscent of something you could pick up at a teenage clothing store. Gifted by Forvr Mood.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was enveloped in a warm and welcoming blend of notes that felt both comforting and empowering. The top notes of sweet yet subtle florals gently introduced themselves, setting a feminine and inviting tone. As the scent settled, the heart notes became more pronounced, revealing a complex bouquet thatu2019s both intriguing and familiar. The base notes, however, are where this perfume truly shines. The depth and warmth they add create a lingering presence thatu2019s both sophisticated and sensual.  Wearing I AM HER feels like embodying a declaration of confidence and elegance. Itu2019s not just a perfume; itu2019s an experience that enhances your presence. The scentu2019s longevity is impressive, staying with me throughout the day without overwhelming my senses or those around me. Itu2019s a versatile fragrance, suitable for both day and night occasions, making it a staple in my collection.  What sets FORVR MOODu2019s I AM HER apart is not just its exceptional scent profile, but how it makes me feel. Itu2019s a reminder of the power and beauty in embracing who I am. Itu2019s rare to find a fragrance that resonates on such a personal level, making this one truly special. * gifted by FORVR mood *

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the scent of this perfume it is so classic and it is a very grown perfume. It would go great with a nice, sweet body spray. I was gifted by I am her . It came with very cute packaging, and a decent amount.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The fragrance has amazing quality I sprayed it and it had over 7 hours of wear. I personally do not like fruity fragrances so I didn't like that it smelt more pear than amber but can't wait to smell the other fragrances !! Great job Jackie !!  complimentary from forvrmood

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has got to be my new favorite scent. The most powerful note being raspberry it is so pleasant! I have already gotten so many compliments and it truly makes me feel good. The packaging is also super adorable. I will definitely be reaching for this on a daily! I was gifted by forver mood.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this fragrance! It is the perfect combination of sweet and fruity, and I feel like it is the type of scent that could work well for everyone. Plus, the packaging is absolutely adorable and would make a perfect gift. I would definitely recommend it very highly. This was gifted by forvrmood.
